154266.「こ……これは……っ。\n すさまじい 魔力の奔流じゃ……！:
This is... this...! A torrent of tremendous
magical power..!

154267.「肉体は 魂の器。不定にして自在。\n 今 我が意思のチカラもて\n かの者を:
The body is the vessel of the soul. It is
indefinite and free. Now, with the power of my
will, I will transform you into human beings!

154269.「いっ……いかん。制御が甘いっ！\n このままでは……！: I...no. I'm not in control! At this rate..!

154272.「あれが 人間の姿になった \n メルジオル…………なワケないよねー。\n 大失:
There is no way that was Merjol in human
form... It's a big failure.

154274.「だめだ。話が通じそうにない……。\n 来るぞっ！:
I can't. I can't seem to communicate... I
can't seem to get through to him... Here they
come!

154279.「メルジオルを 元に戻したかった……。\n でも 失敗……しちゃった……。: I wanted to restore Merjol... But I failed...

154280.「わたしのせいだから……。\n ずっと 魔法 練習して……たのに……。:
It's my fault... I've been practicing magic
all this time...

154282.「……まだまだ 大魔法使いには ほど遠いわ。\n この 未熟者め。:
...I'm still a long way from being a great
mage. You immature bastard.

154283.「魔術の世界とは 広大無辺なもの……。\n お前のような小娘が あせったところで:
The world of magic is vast and boundless. A little girl like you can't do anything with just your feelings, even if you're in a big
hurry!

154284.「……だが わしも お前と同じ。\n まだまだ 親として 未熟じゃった。:
But I'm the same as you. I'm still a very
immature parent.

154285.「あせる気持ちばかりが 先んじて \n わしを思ってくれる お前のまごころを\n:
I was too impatient to take in your sincerity
in thinking of me.

154287.「お前は まだ若い。それは 未熟ではあるが\n 可能性は 無限に広がっている……:
You are still young. That means that although
you are still inexperienced, your
possibilities are endless.

154288.「だから ゆっくりでいい。\n この学園で学び 成長し\n 共に 大魔法使いを目:
So take your time. Let's learn and grow in
this school and aim for the big image
together...Lapis!

154291.<pc>たちは\nメルジオルと共に 対策室まで戻った。:
<pc> and the others returned with
Merjol to the strategy room.
